item.title: Text Mining | NLTK | Python
item.description: In my previous posts, we have crawled some articles and news through RSS feed and HTML tags. We played with google’s nlp api and then as a developer without too much pocket money to play with. You end up looking for cheaper and better alternatives ðŸ‘‰nltk (natual language toolkit). Let’s break the sentence down and let your code to define how will it read ðŸ¤“ How about let the code understand your emotions and ðŸ‘‰ you to the grammar mistake you made.
